Package net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.mojo

Class DependenciesCheckMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.mojo.DependenciesCheckMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
@Mojo(name="check",
      defaultPhase=VERIFY,
      requiresProject=true,
      inheritByDefault=false,
      requiresDependencyResolution=RUNTIME,
      threadSafe=true)
public class DependenciesCheckMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
checks the summary file (csv) against the project dependencies.
Since:
1.8
Author:
Gunnar Tjarks

  • Field Details

    • NAME

      public static final String NAME
      The mojo name.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • project

      @Parameter(property="project", required=true, readonly=true) protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
      The Maven project.

    • csvSummaryFile

      @Parameter(property="csvSummaryFile", defaultValue="dependencies-checksums.csv") protected String csvSummaryFile
      The name of the summary file.

    • scopes

      @Parameter protected List<String> scopes
      The dependency scopes to include.

      Allowed values are compile, test, runtime, provided and system.
      All scopes are included by default.

      Use the following syntax: 

      <scopes>
   <scope>compile<scope>
   <scope>runtime<scope>
 </scopes>
      Since:
      1.0

    • types

      @Parameter protected List<String> types
      The dependency types to include.

      All types are included by default.

      Use the following syntax: 

       <types>
   <type>jar<type>
   <type>zip<type>
 </types>

    • transitive

      @Parameter(property="transitive", defaultValue="false") protected boolean transitive
      Transitive dependencies or direct dependencies only.

    • skip

      @Parameter(property="checksum.skip", defaultValue="false") protected boolean skip
      Flag used to suppress execution.
